long_description: The prAna Sutra Pants for men are hardy enough to stand up to yoga or tough workouts. They keep you just as comfortable in your local coffee shop as they do in the studio. A lightweight blend of hemp, recycled polyester and spandex, wide legs and slight stretch to the fabric make the prAna Sutra pants versatile and easy to wear. Inseam gusset and drawstring waist offer a personalized fit. The prAna Sutra Pants for men feature front pockets for easy storage, and a relaxed fit.
short_description: The prAna Sutra Pants for men are hardy enough to stand up to yoga or tough workouts. They keep you just as comfortable in your local coffee shop as they do in the studio.
